content.text:
# Stardust Award for Superstar of Tomorrow â€“ Male

The Stardust Superstar of Tomorrow - Male is chosen by a distinguished jury as part of the annual Stardust magazine. The award honours a star that has made an impact with their acting and represents new talent.
Here is a list of the award winners and the films for which they won.
{| cellspacing="1" cellpadding="1" border="0" width="50%"
|-
! Year || Actor || Film
|- bgcolor=#edf3fe
| 2003 || Vivek Oberoi || Road & Company
|-

|- bgcolor=#edf3fe

|-

|-

|- bgcolor=#edf3fe

| 2010 || Ranbir Kapoor || Wake Up Sid & Ajab Prem Ki Ghazab Kahani
|- bgcolor=#edf3fe
| 2011 || Ranveer Singh || Band Baaja Baaraat
|-
| 2012 || Ali Zafar || Mere Brother Ki Dulhan
|-bgcolor=#edf3fe
| 2013 || Arjun Kapoor || Ishaqzaade
|-

|-bgcolor=#edf3fe
